hymn.title: O glory, glory, what a life
hymn.chords: | C F/C | C - | C/G G7 | C - | F - | G7 - | C - | C F/C | C - | C F/C | C - | C - | C - | G - | G7 - | C F | C. F/ | C/G G7 | C - |

layout.singingstanza: O glo -- ry, glo -- ry, what a life I have re -- ceived to -- day! All dark -- ness, death and pow'r of sin Have now been chased a -- way! Have now been chased a -- way! Have now, have now been chased a -- way!

lyrics.stanza: O glory, glory, what a life I have received today! All darkness, death and pow'r of sin Have now been chased away! Have now been chased away! Have now, have now been chased away!
